events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car at an intersection.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the incident.
An agent was assigned promptly to the case to ensure the customer receives assistance without delay.
Acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and explaining the next steps.
The customer was asked to submit photographs of the vehicle damage and a police report from the accident.
The customer submitted all required documents, including photos, police report, and insurance details promptly.
The investigation team began evaluating the provided evidence to determine fault and damage extent.
Investigation concluded with a report confirming the situation as a clear vehicle collision with minor damages.
A fair settlement proposal was prepared and sent to the customer covering repair costs and other expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the communication and the settlement offer provided.
The claim was formally approved after the customer accepted the settlement terms without changes.
The payment covering all approved damages was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account successfully.
The claim file was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and resolution of all issues.
All documentation and records related to the claim were archived for future reference and compliance.
